name: web_search
description: Search the web for the specified query.
instructions: Provide the query to search for.
Only use for fact checking and research.
The types of languages that make up keywords should be flexibly determined based on the topic, taking into account the types of topics and cultural considerations.

input_schema.query: query to search for, e.g., 'What is the capital of France?'

return_description: Array value containing the search results. Each result is an object with the following properties: title, description, url.
